fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Culture, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Youth, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Crowdfunding, Startups, Entrepreneurship, Alternative Finance, Blockchain; Digital Transformation; European Capital Market Union;
organisation_name: Institut für Kommunikation in sozialen Medien (ikosom)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: ikosom was created in 2011. It has since then worked with a variety of clients, both private clients, corporations, NGOs, Incubators, regional, national and international governmental organizations and institutions. We regularly participate in Project Calls on the European Level, for instance in Interreg, Erasmus and EP Programmes. We are also members of advisory groups to the European Commission. We focus on the development of policy recommendations in various field of digital technology, especially alternative finance, crowdfunding and peer-to-peer-lending.
